metadata.name: XPLORIUS Pass #1
metadata.description: The Genesis Pass is the first NFT drop by XPLORIUS. Owning this pass will make you the ultimate OG & VIP within our ecosystem with priority access to all of the future endeavors. You will receive 1 FREE MINT of our PFP collection per each Genesis Pass you hold. XPLORIUS PFP collection created by Seiju Park will follow soon after the Genesis Pass drop. Learn more about our PFPs .
